originalTitle: Powerful cyclone kills at least 31 as it tears through Madagascar port
title: Powerful cyclone kills at least 31 as it tears through Madagascar port
content: Madagascar's disaster management says roads are inaccessible with trees uprooted, power poles down and ninety percent of roofs ripped off.

originalTitle: South African Epstein survivor calls on UK Royal Family to search Andrew's files
title: South African Epstein survivor calls on UK Royal Family to search Andrew's files
content: Juliette Bryant has called on the Palace to "act" on revelations about Andrew's relationship with Epstein.

originalTitle: Ghanaians embrace 'Fugu Day' after online mockery of traditional outfits
title: Ghanaians embrace 'Fugu Day' after online mockery of traditional outfits
content: The iconic attire has been trending online for days following the banter between Ghanaians and Zambians.

originalTitle: US FDA declines Moderna flu vaccine review amid vaccine guidance rollback
title: US FDA declines Moderna flu vaccine review amid vaccine guidance rollback
content: CEO Stephane Bancel said the letter refusing review did not cite 'any safety or efficacy concerns'.

originalTitle: Will Thursday’s elections be a watershed moment for Bangladesh?
title: Will Thursday’s elections be a watershed moment for Bangladesh?
content: Millions of people are expected to cast ballots in the first polls since prime minister Sheikh Hasina was removed.

originalTitle: Struggling to get by: Behind the US underemployment crisis
title: Struggling to get by: Behind the US underemployment crisis
content: Trump's tariffs, heightened healthcare and housing costs, and a stagnating jobs market leaves more workers struggling.

originalTitle: Police identify 18-year-old as suspect in Tumbler Ridge shooting
title: Police identify 18-year-old as suspect in Tumbler Ridge shooting
content: Six people were killed and at least 25 others were injured at a school, and two others were found dead at a nearby home.

originalTitle: 'It was terrifying': Tumbler Ridge's tight-knit community in shock after shooting
title: 'It was terrifying': Tumbler Ridge's tight-knit community in shock after shooting
content: Members of the remote community have spoken of their fear and uncertainty after nine people were killed.

title: Watch: Match of the Day
content: Highlights from nine Premier League games from a busy midweek schedule.

originalTitle: Van Dijk scores as Liverpool beat Sunderland to close top four gap
title: Van Dijk scores as Liverpool beat Sunderland to close top four gap
content: Virgil Van Dijk's second half-header gives Liverpool a 1-0 win over Sunderland, as Arne Slot's side become the first team to win away at the Stadium of Light in the Premier League this season.

originalTitle: Haaland ends open-play goal drought as Man City beat Fulham
title: Haaland ends open-play goal drought as Man City beat Fulham
content: Erling Haaland scores his first goal from open play in the Premier League in nine games, as Manchester City soundly defeat Fulham 3-0 to move three points behind league leaders Arsenal.
